data.author: Bloomberg
data.title: Asian stocks enter 2026 under cloud of AI valuation risks, policy divergence
data.description: Asian stocks face challenges in 2026 due to AI valuation concerns and divergent policies amid recent strong performances.
data.content:
Asian equities kicked off the new year with sharp gains, but the advance may face headwinds from worries over an artificial-intelligence bubble and diverging interest-rate paths across the region.
